actions.name: Ballistic
actions.description: The user's next [Contact] Attack loses [Contact], gains [Missile] (if it already had [Missile], its Power increases by +30%), and has its Range multiplied by x6 until it is resolved.

system.description: The user's next [Contact] Attack loses [Contact], gains [Missile] (if it already had [Missile], its Power increases by +30%), and has its Range multiplied by x6 until it is resolved.
